Banner.Description: With 4 years of experience developing systems, interfaces, bots, and technological solutions to make the web a better place. In my work, I like to lead, propose and execute ideas, write and refactor clean, reusable, and scalable.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: In my 4 years as a developer, I seek to train every day. I have worked writing unit tests, performing continuous integration, and covering backend developer roles with Laravel, ExpressJS, Mysql, and MongoDB. I have led teams having empathy, exercising motivation to partners, and setting plans and goals together.
My skills also include implementing system improvements, optimizing sites, standardizing patterns, and suggesting and executing ideas that add value to the project I'm working on.
Some of the technologies that I have trained and worked on include (but are not limited to):
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Fullstack developer
Experience.Jobs.Description: Creation and maintenance of a monitoring platform with graphics in WordPress. Functional programming in templates and plugins to add the necessary monitoring features. Implementation of continuous integration and daily backups. Creation and maintenance of a second Monitoring Platform Done in Angular, Angular Material, Laravel, Mysql, RxJS, Sass with graphics (configurable), alarm system, and user management and configuration of general parameters. Planning meetings in reports.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Independent
Experience.Jobs.Description: Implementing continuous improvements, working on frontend and backend. Creating platforms with Angular, Laravel, ExpressJS, WordPress programmed with functional, reactive, and object-oriented programming paradigms.

Experience.Jobs.Title: FullStack developer
Experience.Jobs.Description: Leading a team of 4 people in the development of a Tourism Data management platform made in Angular, Laravel, and MySQL. Implementation CI / CD in Azure. Refactoring and optimizing application load times. Coding of API requests with RxJS. Writing weekly reports about goals and plans.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Frontend developer
Experience.Jobs.Description: Creation of WordPress templates with ACF, functional programming in Javascript / jQuery, styles in SASS, integration of design improvements, and template loading times. Effective communication with the design team, working with Avocode / Figma.

Experience.Jobs.Title: System analyst
Experience.Jobs.Description: CANTV, largest telecommunications company in the country. As regular assignments, I had to program new functionalities for an existing employee management platform made in Angular and ExpressJS, Perform refactoring of old code. Ensure compatibility of each dependency in every update, along with the regular Angular update as well.

Experience.Jobs.Title: English teacher
Experience.Jobs.Description: Teaching English at a basic level to an enrollment of more than 200 students.

FeatureProjects.Title: My projects
FeatureProjects.Label: Featured Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Agrourbana
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Monitoring application made from scratch with auth module, configurable graphics, configurable alarms, and user management. It also has feedback form logic for parameter configuration.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Tu super plan
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Health plan quote that has a search engine with which advanced queries are made. Plans are displayed based on the user's age, monthly income, and location. It has online chat, contact form, notification system by whatsapp and mail, auth, and internet information management through the role of administrator.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Proyexiot
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Data monitoring platform belonging to water wells, tugboats, and various installations made from scratch with auth module, configurable graphics, configurable alarms, user management, and geolocation with openlayers.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Hands game
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: The rock-paper-scissors game extended. A personal project developed in angular in which you play randomly against the machine. It has the use of services, interfaces, and components.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Countries viewer
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: An interface that consumes an API of countries with which you can view a list of countries, see details of each country, filter by name and region. It also has a dark mode to switch between dark and light themes.

OtherProjects.Title: More projects

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Pokemon
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Pokemon search engine that uses the pokeapi. Object-oriented programming was used to organize the information of the pokemons along with their respective image.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Coming soon page
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Personal project of a two-column split page to be used as a 'Coming soon page'. Scheduled to be a fully responsive design. It has a form field to subscribe by email.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Four card feature section
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: A single page that has a minimal design, listing four features on four cards. Input animations are done with angular animations.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Testimonial slider
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Design of a single page that tells that two testimonials that transition into a slider programmed in angular. The testimonial data is consulted an API developed in ExpressJS stored in Heroku that obtains the data from a MongoDB database.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Article preview
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Preview component of an article. It has been developed in angular and the data is queried through an API developed in NodeJS and the data is stored in a MongoDB database.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Social proof section
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Personal project of a page designed from a Figma layout. Angular was used for development together with SASS and CSS GRID.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: FAQ accordion card
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: FAQ accordion with logic and animations made in Angular.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Profile card
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Simple one-page design that features a profile letter with basic information about a person.

Contact.Title: Get in touch!
Contact.Content: I will be happy to receive your contact if you want to talk about new opportunities. Write me, and I will reply as soon as I see your message. Simple one-page design that features a profile letter with basic information about a person.
